column2: Table 5#4#5B# Private Fixed Investment in Structures by Type

column3: Brokers' commissions on sale of structures
Brokers' commissions on sale of structures
Private fixed investment in new structures \5\

column2: 1. Consists of office buildings, except those constructed at manufacturing sites and those constructed by power utilities for
Includes all financial buildings.  Medical buildings are included in health care.
2. Includes buildings and structures used by the retail, wholesale and selected service industries.  Consists of
auto dealerships, garages, service stations, drug stores, restaurants, mobile structures, and other structures used
for commercial purposes.  Bus or truck garages are included in transportation.
4. Includes water supply, sewage and waste disposal, public safety, highway and street, and conservation and development.
5. Excludes net purchases of used structures and brokers' commissions on the sale of structures.
